H0.text: Who was the author of 'The Overloaded Ark'. David Attenborough

H1.text: Who was the author of 'The Overloaded Ark'. Jane Goodall

H2.text: Who was the author of 'The Overloaded Ark'. Charles Darwin

H3.text: Who was the author of 'The Overloaded Ark'. Gerry Durrell

A4.text: Durrell decided to write an account of his first trip to the Cameroons.

A5.text: The completed typescript, titled The Overloaded Ark, was posted to Faber & Faber with a covering letter mentioning that Gerald was Lawrence's brother.
